pull.title: Modify header guard to contain both directory and file name of the header file script_error.h
pull.body: The new file got merged in, update its header guard.

events.message: Modify header guards to contain both directory and file name of the header file.

events.body: Would have been quicker to merge instead of adding a tag :-P.

I'll cherry-pick the script_error change and leave bitcoinconsensus.h for now.

Merged via 4c83c0e

comments.body:
I'm not sure about this. `bitcoinconsensus.h` is a header that we export as interface. Having the internal directory structure reflected in it makes no sense then.
Especially as there is a large chance that it will move around later.
It should move to include/bitcoinconsensus.h, instead of being in src/script/, imho.
